newsitem.title: SLOVAKIA: Slovak crown gains on stronger c.bank fix.
newsitem.headline: Slovak crown gains on stronger c.bank fix.

text.p: 1500 GMT - Slovak crown extends gains to close some 60 basis points below its mark/dollar basket parity on a stronger central bank crown fix on Thursday.
*Dealers say the fix justified a near-term uptrend.
*Crown/dollar 33.125, crown/mark 19.607, -0.61 pct against basket midpoint, after -0.88 pct at mid-day.
*Thursday's fixing -- crown/dollar 33.267, crown/mark 19.709 putting crown at -1.1 pct against basket midpoint, after Wednesday's fixing at -1.36 pct.
*O/N average rate at 17.24/18.07 pct vs 18.37/19.20 pct at mid-day. 3-month average rate at 17.29/17.75 pct vs 17.46/17.93.
